pr_title: [GEOS-9773] Allow internal GWC to tile WMS requests that don't contain TILED=TRUE in the request parameters

timeline.message: add the rest of the missing chery pick

timeline.bodyText:
Wondering, is this object stored using XStream? I have vague memories that XStream dodges the normal construction mechanism and ends up ignoring field initializers too. I would give it a look.
Believe that normally we use Boolean object wrapper, and in the getter, if null, return the desired default value... at least, that's what we do for CatalogInfo objects :-D
timeline.author: aaime
aaime

timeline.bodyText: Confused, if the new setting affecting capabilities results at all?
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: Direct Integration makes changes by adding in TileSets if tiled=true is sent, so I matched that. I suspect that no one actually uses that feature as it would need hand coding on the client side, but it seemed safest to match the existing behaviour
replies.author: ianturton

replies.bodyText: Oh, I see... hum, that grows the capablities document quite a bit though. I also believe that nobody is really using that feature, the idea here is to use the cache just because clients happen to align to the grid. @simboss what do you think?
replies.author: aaime
